member.name: T:GSR.Jsonic.Formatting.JsonNumberFormatting
member.summary: Formatting defining how to format a .

member.name: P:GSR.Jsonic.Formatting.JsonNumberFormatting.Preserve
member.summary: Write to string exactly as how it was parsed. Overrides all the other settings.

member.name: P:GSR.Jsonic.Formatting.JsonNumberFormatting.PlaceExponent
member.summary:
Should the number be written as containing an exponent denoting the power of 10 to multiply the significand by.
For instance: 9e0 = 9 * 10^1 = 9, 1.2e2 = 1.2 * 10^2 = 120

member.name: P:GSR.Jsonic.Formatting.JsonNumberFormatting.CapitalizeExponent
member.summary:
Should the exponent be denoted with a capital 'E'. If false lowercase 'e' will be used.
Unless indicates otherwise, significand will contain no decimal point.

member.name: P:GSR.Jsonic.Formatting.JsonNumberFormatting.ExplicitlySignExponent
member.summary: Should a '+' prepend the exponent when the exponent is of positive sign.

member.name: P:GSR.Jsonic.Formatting.JsonNumberFormatting.AllowInsignificantDigits
member.summary:
Should insignificant trailing 0s be allowed after the decimal?
See also: .

member.name: P:GSR.Jsonic.Formatting.JsonNumberFormatting.DecimalPositioning
member.summary:
At what position should the decimal point be placed.
Ignored unless or are true.
When is true: 0 indicates no decimal. A negative value indicates the preferred number of digits that will be to the right of the decimal, positioning will be fulfilled as far as possible, any further significant digits will be placed on the left. A positive value indicates the preferred number of digits that will be to the left of the decimal, positioning will be fulfilled as far as possible, any further significant digits will be placed on the right.
When is true:
Trailing 0's will be added after the decimal point in volume sufficient to reach a number of digits equal to the preferred number, as such is only meanigful with a negative value and insufficient significant digits.

member.name: T:GSR.Jsonic.Formatting.JsonObjectFormatting
member.summary: Formatting defining how to format a .

member.name: P:GSR.Jsonic.Formatting.JsonObjectFormatting.PostKeyWhitespace
member.summary: Whitespace to add after the key in a key value pair.

member.name: P:GSR.Jsonic.Formatting.JsonObjectFormatting.PreValueWhitespace
member.summary: Whitespace to add before the value in a key value pair.

member.name: P:GSR.Jsonic.Formatting.JsonStringFormatting.EscapeSolidi
member.summary: Should forward slashes be escaped: '\/'.

member.summary: Newlines as only a linefeed.

member.name: F:GSR.Jsonic.Formatting.NewLineType.CRLF
member.summary: Newlines as a carriage return and then a linefeed.
